channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-16376] [Spark web UI]:HTTP ERROR 500 when using rest api "/applications/[app-id]/jobs" if array "stageIds" is empty
item.description:
[Spark web UI]:HTTP ERROR 500 when using rest api "/applications/[app-id]/jobs" if array "stageIds" is empty

See attachment for reference.

HTTP ERROR 500

Problem accessing /api/v1/applications/application_1466239933301_175531/jobs. Reason:

Server Error
